name: PipAuthenticate
description: Authentication task for the pip client used for installing Python distributions
author: Microsoft Corporation
helpMarkDown: [Learn more about this task](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/reference/pip_install/) or [see the pip documentation](https://pip.pypa.io/)

inputs.name: feedList
inputs.label: My feeds (select below)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select feeds to authenticate present in this organization

inputs.name: externalSources
inputs.label: Feeds from external organizations
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select endpoints to authenticate outside this organization.

messages.Info_AddingInternalFeeds: Adding auth information for %s internal feed(s).
messages.Info_AddingExternalFeeds: Adding auth information for %s external endpoint.
messages.Info_SuccessAddingAuth: Successfully added auth for %s internal feeds and %s external endpoint.
messages.Info_AddingPasswordAuthEntry: Adding username password auth entry for feed %s
messages.Info_AddingTokenAuthEntry: Adding token auth entry for feed %s
messages.Error_FailedToParseFeedUrlAndAuth: Failed to parse the feed url and add auth information. %s
messages.FailedToGetPackagingUri: Unable to get packaging uri, using default collection uri.
messages.FeedTokenUnavailable: Failed to get the access token for this organization.
messages.Warn_TooManyFeedEntries: Too many feed entries for auth. Please reduce the number of repositories in the task.
